question: What specific condition must be met for a health facility to be eligible to apply for narcotic drug quotas from MOHAP's central warehouses?

retrieved-k.text: warehouses for use within the establishment. Service Process 1 The customer shall submit the request, complete Form F6 (APPROVE/ ADJUST NARCOTIC QUOTA), and attach the relevant documents. 2 Request will be endorsed. 3 The customer will pay the submission fees. 4 The MOHAP officer will approve and forward the approval to the customer via email. Conditions & Requirements The quantities of drugs expected to be used annually should be determined. Service completion duration 3 to 5 working days Service fees Application Fee
retrieved-k.context: This service allows hospitals and one-day surgery centers to apply for narcotic drug quotas for use within the facility.
retrieved-k.answer: The facility must submit an official letter from the technical director, detailing the types, quantities, concentrations of narcotic drugs required, and the number of hospital beds and operations performed.

question: What exact documentation must be submitted if a health professional’s license has been canceled and they are applying for a good standing certificate?

retrieved-k.text: Documents Medical staff in the private sector: A copy of medical profession practice card (electronic license issued by MOHAP) A copy of a valid passport A copy of a valid passport An experience certificate issued from the private medical facility, approved by the medical director In case of license cancellation please attach the cancellation letter from MOHAP Medical staff in the government sector: A letter of experience from the Department of Human Resources - Ministry of Health and Prevention or Emirates Health
